resources.string: Enable Bluetooth Connection for Secure and Instant Liquid Transactions!
Bluetooth is disabled. If you change your mind, you can enable Bluetooth in the device settings.

If you invite other people to join Shift, you can earn additional LMC per day and per invitation. This works across three levels. We do this to promote the rapid spread of the app and gain acceptance. Who knows, in the future, you may even be able to pay with the app at the supermarket, as this possibility generates more revenue in-store.
Keep in mind that the shift network is serverless and therefore this service is connecting users and is processing messages in the background.
Email if you want to be updated

You are about to start a service which will scoop liquid in the background, even when you close this app. Please be aware, that when you stop this service the scooping process will be paused until you start the app again.
The plugin has been removed. You should restart your app now.
The plugin has been installed. You should restart your app now.
There was an error copying the plugin.
There was an error installing the plugin.
Let the giver scan the QR-Code to start the transaction.
Agree to the proposal to start the transaction.
Scan the QR-code to get the offer from the receiver.
Please tell the receiver that he or she is not using the original app from CrowdWare.
A network error occurred. Please try again later.
Let the receiver scan the QR-Code to finalize the transaction.
Scan the QR-Code to finalize the transaction.
Please tell the giver that he or she is not using the original app from CrowdWare.
Press the button to book the amount.
SHIFT is a new app for mobile. Get your first liquid micro coins now, by following this link %s , download the app, start it and use this %s or this %s id as invitation code.

SHIFT CONNECTS US ALL
SHIFT is decentralized and will therefore not run on a server.
Your SHIFT account is anonymous, only your real friends know who is behind your account.
No registration needed.
No server means, also no censorship and no ads.
SHIFT also creates liquid micro coins and can be used to show gratitude to other members.
Transaction has been booked to your account.
This exact transaction has already been booked.
Your balance is below the amount asked for.

Thank you for installing this app.

Shift creates a new form of currency that we can use for services and things.
PLEASE NOTE.
All data and transactions are stored only on this device. If you uninstall this app, your balance and transactions will be deleted. It's like throwing away your wallet.
The purpose needs to be entered.
You have scanned the wrong QR-Code.
Enter the URL of the APK
Only LMP (Liquid Micro Payments) can be displayed here.
This agreement was for someone else.
Let the receiver scan the QR code if this step was forgotten.
To add a nearby person you have to exchange each others public key and a Storj access token encoded as a QR-Code.
It looks like you have not entered the Storj credentials yet. We need that storage to store messages, blogposts, pictures and the like. Please go to the website of Storj at

, create a free account with 25 GB of free space, add a bucket, create an access token with write,list,delete permission and enter these credentials in the settings page of this app. Then come back here.
Scan the QR-Code to get the keys.
